Text:
@jalucian ... Dude you're a fuckin douche! How bout thank you for the effort but I prefer blah blah blah.
I can't believe the nerve of some people on this site... it's free! You have absolutely no right to complain either say thank you or STFU
Sir, I believe 720p has a resolution of 1280×720.

@shadowlago95

720p counts the black margins. When you rip a film you don't usually process the black margins because it is useless and it reduces the size of the file.

@S1L3nCe

Width:852 mpixels
Height:480 pixels

This is NOT 720p. And the 'black margins' are non-existent in TV shows as the 1280x720 resolution is the normal 16:9 screen rate resolution.

This should be labeled 480p, not 720p.
